strings.Value: [Grab the forging hammer and try to break the armor]
{n}Huge iron spaulders, enormous breastplates, massive vambraces the size of a small shield... Is this a troll suit of armor?{/n}

{n}Parts of the armor are riveted together or connected by thick leather straps. Pull out the rivets using tongs that lie nearby, cut the straps — and the armor will fall apart! You set about it, and soon the troll armor is no more.{/n}
{n}You examine one of the suits of armor thoroughly, but you fail to find a way to damage it.{/n}

{n}Your forehead is sweating, your face is red... little by little, the armor starts to give in under the heavy blows. Soon, the troll armor is just a heap of crumpled metal. Fortunately no one was drawn here by the noise — most likely because it was coming from the smithy.{/n}
{n}The armor is crude, but forged to last. No matter how hard you try, you fail to make a dent.{/n}
"You know what goblins are good at? Ruining stuff! Watch — just need to cut this strap, that bind..."
